What is Online MBA Program at Hult International Business School

The Online MBA Program at Hult International Business School is a 15-month, fully online program that is designed to help you develop the skills and knowledge you need to succeed in a global business environment. The program is taught by a team of experienced academics and business professionals, and it offers a wide range of modules, including finance, marketing, strategy, and leadership.

The Online MBA Program at Hult International Business School is accredited by the Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business (AACSB), which is the world’s premier business school accreditation body. This accreditation means that the program meets the highest standards of academic excellence.

The Online MBA Program at Hult International Business School is also ranked highly by the Financial Times, which is one of the world’s leading business publications. In the 2024 Financial Times Global MBA Ranking, the Hult Online MBA was ranked 10th in the world.

Benefits of Studying Online MBA at Hult International Business School

Here are some of the benefits of studying for an Online MBA at Hult International Business School:

  • A world-class business school: Hult International Business School is ranked among the top business schools in the world.
  • A strong academic reputation: The Online MBA Program at Hult International Business School is accredited by the AACSB, which is the world’s premier business school accreditation body.
  • A diverse and international student body: The Online MBA Program at Hult International Business School attracts students from all over the world, which provides you with the opportunity to learn from and network with people from different cultures.
  • A strong alumni network: Hult International Business School has a strong alumni network of over 100,000 graduates, which can provide you with valuable support and guidance after you graduate.

If you are interested in applying for the Online MBA Program at Hult International Business School, you can find more information on the university’s website.

Features of the Hult International Business School Online MBA Course

Here are some of the key features of the Online MBA Program at Hult International Business School:

  • Flexibility: The program is fully online, which means that you can study from anywhere in the world.
  • Recognition: The program is accredited by the AACSB, which is the world’s premier business school accreditation body.
  • Internationalization: The program attracts students from all over the world, which provides you with the opportunity to learn from and network with people from different cultures.
  • Career support: Hult International Business School offers a variety of career support services to help you find a job after you graduate.

If you are looking for a top-ranked, fully online MBA program that will give you the skills and knowledge you need to succeed in a global business environment, then the Online MBA Program at Hult International Business School is a great option.

MBA Requirements at Hult International Business School

Global One-Year MBA

Boston, Dubai, London, New York City, San Francisco, Shanghai
1-year, full-time program

Duration 12 months
Intake Fall
Application fee USD150
Admission Requirements
  • Three or more years of relevant work experience
  • Bachelor degree or equivalent
  • Proficiency in English
Application Checklist
  • Current resume/CV
  • Personal statement as a 400-500 word essay
  • One academic or professional reference
  • A copy of your Bachelor degree or equivalent
  • Transcripts (in English) from all universities attended
  • GMAT, GRE, or the Hult Business Assessment Test
  • Evidence of English proficiency, if it is not your native language

Global Executive MBA

Dubai, London, online, online, online, Shanghai
Executive MBA program

Classes take place over one four-day weekend each month.
Courses are taught in English.

Duration 2-4 years. In as little as 18 months
Intake October
Application fee $150
Admission Requirements
  • Minimum 3 years’ work experience (average 12 years)
  • Bachelor degree or equivalent experience
  • Proficiency in English
Application Checklist
  • Current resume/CV
  • Personal statement as a 400-500 word essay
  • One professional or academic reference
  • Transcripts (in English) from all universities attended

Metropolitan EMBA

Bogota, Las Condes, Lima, Mexico City, New York City, Sao Paulo, Toronto
Executive MBA program

Take interactive classes and participate in team sessions in your home city, or the the city closest to you in North or South America.

Duration 24-month program with options to complete in 18-months
